result.title: Help with problem solution
result.content:
Since 2 weeks I'm thinking about one problem and still I can't figure out proper solution. Can you help me guys?

Short statement:

You have [1 x n] board and on each field of it you can place exactly one ball, also you have m queries described by 3 values ai, bi, ci, what means that in the range [ai, bi] of a board you want to be at least ci balls placed. Calculate minimal ammount of balls needed to be place so that all queries will be met.
